segments.text: What part did you get in the play this time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got a character part â€” some old lady who shows up in a few scenes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish I had a character part . Those are my favorite .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you kidding ? You got the leading role .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , but I've done that so Ay times . It's getting old . The leading guy is always the same macho A .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would trade you if I could but I don't think I'd be a very convincing macho A .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next time . You are going to love your part . I've seen the script .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do a good old lady . I wouldn't mind being the damsel in distress once in a while .
segments.speaker: S2
